name: Down We Go
description: Clear Floor %var% of the Spiral Abyss.

name: Down to Dodge
description: Complete Spiral Abyss %var%-3 without taking any DMG.

name: My Precious
description: Complete Spiral Abyss 2-2 with an undamaged Ley Line Monolith.

name: Abyssal Crusader
description: Obtain all Abyssal Stars in the Spiral Abyss.
